Quality Assurance (QA) Analyst » Test Planning & Strategy | Test Management & Execution

Here, I served as Supply Chain IT Quality Assurance Lead for this large San Francisco-based retail client. My goal was to augment and enhance the existing business to allow for independent handling, tracking, receiving and invoicing of wholesale operations. The project impacted all brands and focused on a variety of multi-brand resellers.✔ Collaborated with business partners to develop acceptance criterion.✔ Prepared and executed test plans and documented test results.✔ Tested large-scale enterprise software (ERP), executing Product Lifecycle Management for apparel product sourcing, development, order processing, and logistics/fulfillment.✔ Developed release notes and user manuals for 2 product release versions.✔ Facilitated root cause analysis in collaboration with the Business Analyst Team.✔ Validated software bug fixes prior to deployment and approved hotfixes and fully resolved issues.
Software Quality Assurance (QA) Specialist » Manual Testing | Black Box Testing | Testing Tools

This role involved developing test cases and regression suites based on complex business requirements. I collaborated with the team in performing complex initial business functional testing, regression testing, and test data conditioning for all projects utilizing DIBS. I also logged, tracked and verified defects and retested fixes.✔ Facilitated developers in retesting fixed defects within the Development Environment and analyzed test cases written by peers.✔ Managed Call Steering project, aimed at delivering an enhanced caller experience by utilizing NLU capabilities in the main menu. Included a multi-slot feature to capture multiple keys from an utterance to provide caller intents. ✔ Wrote and executed test cases in IVR Voice Biometrics for card services (AMEX), card balance transfers, card services (VISA & MC), line of credit, express access, high value clients, military banking, mortgage, online authentication, online servicing, online fraud, total private banking and Wells Fargo Advisors. ✔ Employed the use of multiple applications including DIBS, IVR Logs, HP Application Lifecycle Management, HPQC, WinScp, Mortimer, and Hogan Mainframe.
Software Quality Assurance (QA) Consultant » Test Management & Execution | Regression Testing

At Charles Schwab, I served on two different contracts, managing QA projects within the VOIP, Schwab by phone and Telebroker divisions.✔ Designed certification scripts, executing pre-production and production certification and validations for each installation.✔ Performed testing on defect fixes, reporting resolution, and uploading all known defects into Clear Quest defect tracking system.✔ Discussed with partners to resolve testing challenges✔ Analyzed, Tested and Certified on all projects✔ Participated in the planning and execution of milestones and schedules on assigned projects.✔ Logged, tracked and verified resolution of software and specification defects on all VOIP.✔ Tested for 21 character symbology for options trading.✔ Wrote and executed regression, functional, and integration test scripts and documented all phases of testing.✔ Conducted tests for Check request, Money link, Create / Edit Watch list, Options, Securities, and Mutual funds modules.
Consultant  - San Francisco Professional Career NetworK
San Francisco Professional Career Network Meet Up
✔ Coordinated programming team and headline speakers on multiple career topics for weekly participants.✔ Led the Executive search committee and consulted with leadership on rebranding name.
Quality Assurance Consultant  » Manual Testing | Regression Testing | Defect Tracking

In this role, I trained and led 3 Quality Assurance resources through various projects, including a mobile Point of Sale project, creating scope, traceability matrix, test strategy, test cases and executing regression testing. I also participated in defect meetings.✔ Used Jira to log defects also retested and verified and closed defects.✔ Managed Co-Brand Credit Cards Project, creating tests with various CC and Barclays in house CC for changes.✔ Steered Paperless Receipts Project, defining scope, traceability matrix, test strategy and test cases.✔ Executed test cases for client telling project  and store inventory and receiving projects.✔ Led testing for content personalization, country of citizenship credit card application validation, multiple emails validation projects, retail returns database for fraud returns, and e-receipt project.✔ Utilized store scheduling tool for time clock scheduling validation and performed browser testing.

summary: Habib Lichaa | Quality Assurance Analyst ⌨ hlichaa@gmail.com ☎ 650-290-0974 I am senior QA Engineer and Testing Team Coordinator/QA Test Lead with a solid background ensuring application readiness and improving the quality and performance of software. What I do is  develop and document test plans and test cases. I regularly collaborate with development engineers to drive issues to resolution and closure.Having over 17 years of experience, I bring an expert understanding of testing and QA best practices and methodologies. I have a keen instinct for uncovering quality, usability and performance issues. My strengths also include planning, tracking issues, and identifying and managing risks. I am well-versed performing comprehensive root cause analysis of problems and isolating issues. I believe in creating a culture of zero-tolerance for buggy software delivery.I offer a rare combination of leadership/people management instincts combined with functional/content QA activities. I have provided direct leadership and guidance to the testing team. Furthermore, I am able to quickly get up to speed on new applications and leverage consulting expertise to adopt best practices and improve new software.► Areas of Expertise ◄⇨ Quality Assurance⇨ Test Planning & Strategy⇨ Test Design & Development	⇨ Test Management & Execution⇨ Testing Tools⇨ Manual Testing⇨ Integration Testing	⇨ User Acceptance Testing⇨ Black Box Testing⇨ Regression Testing⇨ Defect Life Cycle & Management⇨ Defect Identification, Tracking & Logging⇨ Software Development Life Cycle⇨ Problem Resolution⇨ Troubleshooting⇨ Cross-Functional Team Collaboration⇨ Organization & Simplification of Data
